name: Slacky
description:
A short game where you play Slacky.  To up your score you must stay as long as possible in the circle but if you stay too much, you take damage and you have only 3 life point.

Do your best score !

I make this game alone and in 6 hours with Unreal Engine.

It was a challenge and i'll do this challenge again every Wendnesday on my twitch channel.
